00017 class SynapseFactory : public virtual EvSimObjectFactory {
00018 public:
00019 
00020         virtual ~SynapseFactory() {};
00021 
00022         virtual SpikeResponse *createSpikeResponseObject() const {return 0;};
00023         virtual SpikeResponse *createBackpropAPResponseObject() const {return 0;};
00024 
00025         virtual bool usesSharedPSResponse() const {return false;};
00026 
00027         virtual bool usesSharedBackpropAPResponse() const {return false;};
00028

00030                 return false;
00031         }
00032 
00033         virtual Time getManagedDelay() const {
00034                 return 0;
00035         }
00036 
00037         virtual Time getBackpropAPDelay() const {
00038                 return 0;
00039         }

00043 class Synapse : public EvSimObject, public SynapseFactory {
00044 public:
00045 
00046         double getPSR() {return psr;};
00047 
00048         virtual void setBackpropAPResponse(SpikeResponse *bap_response) {};
00049 
00050         virtual void setPostSynResponse(SpikeResponse *response) {};
00051 
00052         virtual bool needsPostSynResponse() {return true;};
00053 
00054         virtual bool needsBackpropAPResponse() {return true;};
00055 
00056         virtual bool isPlastic() { return false; };
00057 
00058         virtual bool isActive() {return false;}
00059 
00060 
00061         virtual void postMountAsMountedObj(EvSimNetwork &net, EvSimObject::ID self, EvSimObject::ID mountpoint)
00062         {
00063                 mountToNeuron(net,self, mountpoint);
00064         }
00065 
00066         virtual ~Synapse();
00067 
00068 protected:
00069 
00070         void updatePSR(double new_psr, Time) {
00071                 psr = new_psr;
00072         }
00073 
00074         void resetPSRs() {
00075                 psr = 0;
00076         }
00077 
00078 
00079         Neuron * mountToNeuron(EvSimNetwork &net, EvSimObject::ID &self, EvSimObject::ID &nrn) {
00080                 Neuron *nrn_obj = dynamic_cast<Neuron *>(net.getObject(nrn));
00081                 if (!nrn_obj) {
00082                         throw evesim::ConstructionException("ActiveSynapse::mountToNeuron",
00083                                                            "Can not mount a Synapse object. The mountpoint must be of 'Neuron' type.");
00084                 }
00085                 if (nrn_obj->requiresActiveSynapse() && !isActive()) {
00086                         throw evesim::ConstructionException("ActiveSynapse::mountToNeuron",
00087                                                                                    "Can not mount the Synapse object which is not active. The mountpoint Neuron requires an active synapse.");
00088                 }
00089 
00090                 update_id_t update_id = nrn_obj->registerInputSynapse(dynamic_cast<EvSimObject *>(this));
00091                 net.causalUpdateLink(self, nrn, update_id);
00092                 return nrn_obj;
00093         }
00094 
00095         double psr;
00096 };
00097 
00098 
00099 class ActiveSynapse : public Synapse {
00100 public:
00101 
00102         ~ActiveSynapse();
00103 
00104         virtual void postMountAsMountedObj(EvSimNetwork &net, EvSimObject::ID self, EvSimObject::ID mountpoint) {
00105                 target_nrn = mountToNeuron(net, self, mountpoint);
00106         }
00107 
00108         virtual bool isActive() {
00109                 return true;
00110         }
00111 
00112 
00113 protected:
00114         Neuron *target_nrn;
00115 
00116         void updatePSR(double new_psr, Time time) {
00117                 psr_old = psr;
00118                 psr = new_psr;
00119                 target_nrn->updatePSR(psr, psr - psr_old, time);
00120         }
00121 
00122         void resetPSRs() {
00123                 psr = psr_old = 0;
00124         }
00125 
00126         double psr_old;
00127 };
